executiveSummary: Laren Lockwood, a former teacher from Burnet, Texas, pitched her company Lion Latch on Shark Tank, seeking $150,000 for 15% equity. Despite strong personal motivation and sales of $530,000 over five years, all Sharks declined to invest, citing scalability and manufacturing challenges.

actionItems.task: Find a reliable manufacturer to improve product scalability and quality control
Consider hiring operational support to manage order fulfillment and scaling

nextSteps: Laren Lockwood will continue developing Lion Latch independently, focusing on solving manufacturing issues and expanding production capacity.
